rComments: Professor Duane is great. He's really intelligent and definitely knows what he's talking about. This class is reading intensive but it helps you gain a better understanding of the material. The midterm and final are 80% of the grade so if you don't understand something make sure you go to office hours!
Excellent professor. Entertaining and informative lectures, very thought provoking. His law/hero stories are great. Very relevant case studies and realistic expectation.

OK, Energy Policy is sort of my thing, but Tim is a really awesome guy. Not the easiest class, and he needs to get better at writing tests that aren't about little tiny details, but I learned a lot. There's often a long line for his office hours, partly because he's so nice and approachable. My favorite UCSC prof.

Tim's class is not one you can get through without considerable effort, but it is one you'll learn a lot from. He's actively engaged in the field, teaches law at Vermont, will definitely make you laugh (at least chuckle) every lecture, and although being the most intimidating prof at ucsc (for me), is totally approachable when you reach out.
